statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_data
SELECT id, company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data
SELECT company_name, regulation_type, last_audit_date FROM compliance_data
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant'
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_type, last_audit_date FROM compliance_data ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_type FROM compliance_data ORDER BY company_name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'GDPR' AND compliance_status IS NULL;
SELECT company_name, regulation_type, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE last_audit_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_audit_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM compliance_data GROUP BY regulation_type;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_compliance_records FROM compliance_data GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'HIPAA'
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE id = 3
SELECT standard_name, description FROM industry_standards WHERE published_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT id, company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT * FROM industry_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE '%ISO%'
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, regulation_type FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'GDPR';
SELECT * FROM industry_standards WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM industry_standards WHERE standard_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT company_name, last_audit_date FROM ComplianceData ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceData WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT company_name, last_audit_date FROM ComplianceData WHERE last_audit_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY company_name
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT company_name, last_audit_date FROM ComplianceData ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC
SELECT c.company_name, h.audit_date, h.compliance_result FROM ComplianceData c JOIN ComplianceHistory h ON c.id = h.company_id WHERE h.audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT c.company_name, s.standard_name, s.description FROM ComplianceData c JOIN IndustryStandards s ON c.company_name = s.standard_name
SELECT c.company_name, COUNT(h.history_id) AS audit_count FROM ComplianceData c LEFT JOIN ComplianceHistory h ON c.id = h.company_id GROUP BY c.company_name HAVING audit_count > 2
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT id, agency_name FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT standard_code, description FROM standards WHERE id = 3;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT company_id, standard_id, compliance_level FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT id, agency_name FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT company_name, location, industry FROM companies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT standard_code, description FROM standards WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT company_name, compliance_level FROM companies INNER JOIN compliance_records ON companies.id = compliance_records.company_id WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_level = 'Low' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT regulation_name AS Name, description AS Details FROM regulations;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regulations;
